directions: Peel onions, and remove ends.  Cut each onion into quarters.  Place 2 quarters of onion in a 6 inch square piece of tin foil, inserting a slice of butter or margarine between the pieces. Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Close foil around onion. Repeat with remaining onions.
Set foil packets on lower rack of a gas grill, or directly on top of  hot coals.  Cook for about 30 to 35 minutes.
title: Savory Grilled Onions
